trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to release both managed and unmanaged resources; <see langword="false" /> to release only unmanaged resources.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> 表示釋放 Managed 和 Unmanaged 資源，<see langword="false" /> 則表示只釋放 Unmanaged 資源。

trans-unit.source: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the <see cref="T:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort" /> and optionally releases the managed resources.
trans-unit.target: 釋放 <see cref="T:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort" /> 所使用的 Unmanaged 資源，並選擇性地釋放 Managed 資源。

trans-unit.source: This method is called by the public <xref:System.ComponentModel.Component.Dispose%2A> method and the <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會呼叫公用<xref:System.ComponentModel.Component.Dispose%2A>方法和<xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.ComponentModel.Component.Dispose%2A> invokes the protected <xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.Dispose%2A> method with the `disposing` parameter set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ComponentModel.Component.Dispose%2A> 叫用受保護<xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.Dispose%2A>方法`disposing`參數設定為`true`。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> invokes <xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.Dispose%2A> with `disposing` set to `false`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> 叫用<xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.Dispose%2A>與`disposing`設`false`。

trans-unit.source: When the `disposing` parameter is `true`, this method releases all resources held by any managed objects that this <xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort> references.
trans-unit.target: `disposing` 參數為 `true` 時，這個方法會釋放 <xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort> 參考的任何 Managed 物件所掌握的資源。

trans-unit.source: This method invokes the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Component.Dispose%2A> method of each referenced object.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會叫用每個參考物件的 <xref:System.ComponentModel.Component.Dispose%2A> 方法。

trans-unit.source: This method flushes and closes the stream object in the <xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.BaseStream%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法清除，並關閉資料流物件<xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.BaseStream%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: The port is in an invalid state.
trans-unit.target: 連接埠處於無效狀態。

trans-unit.source: \- or -
An attempt to set the state of the underlying port failed.
trans-unit.target: 嘗試設定基礎連接埠的狀態失敗。

trans-unit.source: For example, the parameters passed from this <see cref="T:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort" /> object were invalid.
trans-unit.target: 例如，從這個 <see cref="T:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort" /> 物件傳遞而來的參數無效。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="M:System.ComponentModel.Component.Dispose" /> can be called multiple times by other objects.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="M:System.ComponentModel.Component.Dispose" /> 可以被其他物件呼叫多次。

trans-unit.source: When overriding <see cref="M:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.Dispose(System.Boolean)" />, be careful not to reference objects that have been previously disposed of in an earlier call to <see cref="M:System.ComponentModel.Component.Dispose" />.
trans-unit.target: 覆寫 <see cref="M:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.Dispose(System.Boolean)" /> 時，請小心不要參考到先前已在對 <see cref="M:System.ComponentModel.Component.Dispose" /> 的早期呼叫中被處置 (Dispose) 的物件。

trans-unit.source: For more information about how to implement <see cref="M:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.Dispose(System.Boolean)" />, see [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需有關如何實作<see cref="M:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.Dispose(System.Boolean)" />，請參閱[實作 Dispose 方法](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md)。

trans-unit.source: For more information about <see cref="M:System.ComponentModel.Component.Dispose" /> and <see cref="M:System.Object.Finalize" />, see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需有關<see cref="M:System.ComponentModel.Component.Dispose" />和<see cref="M:System.Object.Finalize" />，請參閱[清除 Unmanaged 資源上](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md)。

trans-unit.source: Gets the state of the Data Set Ready (DSR) signal.
trans-unit.target: 取得 Data Set Ready (DSR) 信號的狀態。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if a Data Set Ready signal has been sent to the port; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 Data Set Ready (DSR) 信號已傳送至連接埠則為 <see langword="true" />；否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: This property is used in Data Set Ready/Data Terminal Ready (DSR/DTR) handshaking.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性用於 Data Set 已備妥/資料 Terminal Ready (DSR/DTR) 信號交換。

trans-unit.source: The Data Set Ready (DSR) signal is usually sent by a modem to a port to indicate that it is ready for data transmission or data reception.
trans-unit.target: Data Set Ready (DSR) 信號是通常由傳送數據機連接埠表示已準備好進行資料傳輸或接收資料。

trans-unit.source: The port is in an invalid state.
trans-unit.target: 連接埠處於無效狀態。

trans-unit.source: \- or -
An attempt to set the state of the underlying port failed.
trans-unit.target: 嘗試設定基礎連接埠的狀態失敗。

trans-unit.source: For example, the parameters passed from this <see cref="T:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort" /> object were invalid.
trans-unit.target: 例如，從這個 <see cref="T:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort" /> 物件傳遞而來的參數無效。

trans-unit.source: The stream is closed.
trans-unit.target: 資料流已關閉。

trans-unit.source: This can occur because the <see cref="M:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.Open" /> method has not been called or the <see cref="M:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.Close" /> method has been called.
trans-unit.target: 這可能是因為尚未呼叫 <see cref="M:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.Open" /> 方法，或是已經呼叫 <see cref="M:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.Close" /> 方法而發生。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that enables the Data Terminal Ready (DTR) signal during serial communication.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，在序列通訊期間啟用 Data Terminal Ready (DTR) 信號。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to enable Data Terminal Ready (DTR); otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> 表示啟用 Data Terminal Ready (DTR)，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Data Terminal Ready (DTR) is typically enabled during XON/XOFF software handshaking and Request to Send/Clear to Send (RTS/CTS) hardware handshaking, and modem communications.
trans-unit.target: XON/XOFF 軟體交握和要求來傳送 (RTS/CTS) 硬體信號交換和數據機通訊的傳送/清除期間，通常會啟用 data Terminal Ready (DTR)。

trans-unit.source: The port is in an invalid state.
trans-unit.target: 連接埠處於無效狀態。

trans-unit.source: \- or -
An attempt to set the state of the underlying port failed.
trans-unit.target: 嘗試設定基礎連接埠的狀態失敗。

trans-unit.source: For example, the parameters passed from this <see cref="T:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort" /> object were invalid.
trans-unit.target: 例如，從這個 <see cref="T:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort" /> 物件傳遞而來的參數無效。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the byte encoding for pre- and post-transmission conversion of text.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定文字傳輸前後轉換的位元組編碼方式。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Text.Encoding" /> object.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Text.Encoding" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see cref="T:System.Text.ASCIIEncoding" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see cref="T:System.Text.ASCIIEncoding" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.Encoding" /> property was set to <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.Encoding" /> 屬性被設定為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.Encoding" /> property was set to an encoding that is not <see cref="T:System.Text.ASCIIEncoding" />, <see cref="T:System.Text.UTF8Encoding" />, <see cref="T:System.Text.UTF32Encoding" />, <see cref="T:System.Text.UnicodeEncoding" />, one of the Windows single byte encodings, or one of the Windows double byte encodings.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.Encoding" /> 屬性設定的編碼方式，不是 <see cref="T:System.Text.ASCIIEncoding" />、<see cref="T:System.Text.UTF8Encoding" />、<see cref="T:System.Text.UTF32Encoding" />、<see cref="T:System.Text.UnicodeEncoding" />、其中一個 Windows 信號位元組編碼方式或其中一個 Windows 雙位元組編碼方式。

trans-unit.source: Indicates that an error has occurred with a port represented by a <see cref="T:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 表示在 <see cref="T:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort" /> 物件所代表的連接埠上已發生錯誤。

trans-unit.source: Error events can be caused by any of the items in the <xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialError> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: 可以由任何中的項目所造成的錯誤事件<xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialError>列舉型別。

trans-unit.source: Because the operating system determines whether to raise this event or not, not all parity errors may be reported.
trans-unit.target: 由於作業系統會決定是否要引發這個事件，並非所有的同位檢查錯誤可能會報告。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.PinChanged>, <xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.DataReceived>, and <xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.ErrorReceived> events may be called out of order, and there may be a slight delay between when the underlying stream reports the error and when code can when the event handler is executed.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.PinChanged><xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.DataReceived>，和<xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.ErrorReceived>事件可能呼叫順序，並可能稍有延遲，基礎資料流時報告錯誤和事件處理常式執行時，程式碼時可以之間。

trans-unit.source: Only one event handler can execute at a time.
trans-unit.target: 只有一個事件處理常式可以執行一次。

trans-unit.source: If a parity error occurs on the trailing byte of a stream, an extra byte will be added to the input buffer with a value of 126.
trans-unit.target: 如果同位檢查錯誤發生的資料流結尾的位元組，額外的位元組會加入輸入緩衝區，其值為 126。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.ErrorReceived> event is raised on a secondary thread when an error is received from the <xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort> object.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.ErrorReceived>次要執行緒上引發事件時收到錯誤<xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort>物件。

trans-unit.source: Because this event is raised on a secondary thread, and not the main thread, attempting to modify some elements in the main thread, such as UI elements, could raise a threading exception.
trans-unit.target: 因為次要執行緒，而不主執行緒，嘗試修改某些項目，例如 UI 項目，在主執行緒中的引發這個事件可能會引發執行緒的例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: If it is necessary to modify elements in the main <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control>, post change requests back using <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Invoke%2A>, which will do the work on the proper thread.
trans-unit.target: 如果有必要修改在主要的項目<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control>、 張貼變更要求使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Invoke%2A>，這會執行適當的執行緒上的工作。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。

trans-unit.source: Gets an array of serial port names for the current computer.
trans-unit.target: 取得目前電腦序列埠名稱的陣列。

trans-unit.source: An array of serial port names for the current computer.
trans-unit.target: 目前電腦序列埠名稱的陣列。

trans-unit.source: The order of port names returned from <xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.GetPortNames%2A> is not specified.
trans-unit.target: 從連接埠名稱的順序傳回<xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.GetPortNames%2A>未指定。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.GetPortNames%2A> method to query the current computer for a list of valid serial port names.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.GetPortNames%2A>方法來查詢目前的電腦，如需有效的序列埠名稱的清單。

trans-unit.source: For example, you can use this method to determine whether COM1 and COM2 are valid serial ports for the current computer.
trans-unit.target: 例如，您可以使用這個方法來判斷 COM1 和 COM2 是否為有效的序列通訊埠目前電腦。

trans-unit.source: The port names are obtained from the system registry (for example, HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\HARDWARE\DEVICEMAP\SERIALCOMM).
trans-unit.target: 連接埠名稱是從系統登錄 (例如，HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\HARDWARE\DEVICEMAP\SERIALCOMM) 取得。

trans-unit.source: If the registry contains stale or otherwise incorrect data then the <xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.GetPortNames%2A> method will return incorrect data.
trans-unit.target: 如果登錄包含過時或否則不正確的資料則<xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.GetPortNames%2A>方法會傳回不正確的資料。

trans-unit.source: The following code example uses the <xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.GetPortNames%2A> method to display serial port names to the console.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例使用<xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.GetPortNames%2A>方法來對主控台顯示序列埠名稱。

trans-unit.source: The serial port names could not be queried.
trans-unit.target: 無法查詢序列埠名稱。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the handshaking protocol for serial port transmission of data using a value from <see cref="T:System.IO.Ports.Handshake" />.
trans-unit.target: 使用來自 <see cref="T:System.IO.Ports.Handshake" /> 的值，取得或設定用於資料序列埠傳輸的交握通訊協定。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.IO.Ports.Handshake" /> values.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個 <see cref="T:System.IO.Ports.Handshake" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="None" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see langword="None" />。

trans-unit.source: When handshaking is used, the device connected to the <xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort> object is instructed to stop sending data when there is at least (<xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.ReadBufferSize%2A>-1024) bytes in the buffer.
trans-unit.target: 使用交握時，裝置會連線到<xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort>停止傳送資料時至少會指示的物件 (<xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.ReadBufferSize%2A>-1024) 緩衝區內的位元組。

trans-unit.source: The device is instructed to start sending data again when there are 1024 or fewer bytes in the buffer.
trans-unit.target: 裝置會指示重新開始傳送資料時緩衝區中有 1024年或更少個位元組。

trans-unit.source: If the device is sending data in blocks that are larger than 1024 bytes, this may cause the buffer to overflow.
trans-unit.target: 如果裝置正在傳送大於 1024 個位元組的區塊中的資料，這可能會導致緩衝區溢位。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.Handshake%2A> property is set to <xref:System.IO.Ports.Handshake.RequestToSendXOnXOff> and <xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.CtsHolding%2A> is set to `false`, the XOff character will not be sent.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.Handshake%2A>屬性設定為<xref:System.IO.Ports.Handshake.RequestToSendXOnXOff>和<xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.CtsHolding%2A>設`false`，將不會傳送 xoff 輸入字元。

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.CtsHolding%2A> is then set to `true`, more data must be sent before the XOff character will be sent.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.CtsHolding%2A>會接著設為`true`，將會傳送 XOff 字元之前必須傳送更多資料。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the use of the <xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort> class to allow two users to chat from two separate computers connected by a null modem cable.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用<xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort>允許透過 null 數據機纜線連接兩個不同的電腦從交談的兩個使用者類別。

trans-unit.source: In this example, the users are prompted for the port settings and a username before chatting.
trans-unit.target: 在此範例中，會提示使用者輸入的連接埠設定及使用者名稱才能交談。

trans-unit.source: This code example is part of a larger code example provided for the <xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort> class.
trans-unit.target: 這個程式碼範例是提供之較大程式碼範例的一部分<xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort>類別。

trans-unit.source: The port is in an invalid state.
trans-unit.target: 連接埠處於無效狀態。

trans-unit.source: \- or -
An attempt to set the state of the underlying port failed.
trans-unit.target: 嘗試設定基礎連接埠的狀態失敗。

trans-unit.source: For example, the parameters passed from this <see cref="T:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort" /> object were invalid.
trans-unit.target: 例如，從這個 <see cref="T:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort" /> 物件傳遞而來的參數無效。

trans-unit.source: The value passed is not a valid value in the <see cref="T:System.IO.Ports.Handshake" /> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: 傳遞的值不是 <see cref="T:System.IO.Ports.Handshake" /> 列舉型別中的有效值。

trans-unit.source: Indicates that no time-out should occur.
trans-unit.target: 指出不應該發生逾時。

trans-unit.source: This value is used with the <xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.ReadTimeout%2A> and <xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.WriteTimeout%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: 此值可用於搭配<xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.ReadTimeout%2A>和<xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.WriteTimeout%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating the open or closed status of the <see cref="T:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，指出 <see cref="T:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort" /> 物件的開啟或關閉狀態。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the serial port is open; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果序列埠已開啟則為 <see langword="true" />；否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.IsOpen%2A> property tracks whether the port is open for use by the caller, not whether the port is open by any application on the machine.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.IsOpen%2A>屬性會追蹤是否已開啟以供呼叫端的連接埠，不是否已開啟連接埠上的任何應用程式。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.IsOpen" /> value passed is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 傳遞的 <see cref="P:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.IsOpen" /> 值為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.IsOpen" /> value passed is an empty string ("").
trans-unit.target: 傳遞的 <see cref="P:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.IsOpen" /> 值為空字串 ("")。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the value used to interpret the end of a call to the <see cref="M:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.ReadLine" /> and <see cref="M:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.WriteLine(System.String)" /> methods.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，用於解譯 <see cref="M:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.ReadLine" /> 和 <see cref="M:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.WriteLine(System.String)" />方法呼叫的結尾。

trans-unit.source: A value that represents the end of a line.
trans-unit.target: 表示行結尾的值。

trans-unit.source: The default is a line feed, <see cref="P:System.Environment.NewLine" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設為換行字元 (<see cref="P:System.Environment.NewLine" />)。

trans-unit.source: This property determines what value (byte) defines the end of a line for the <xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.ReadLine%2A> and <xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.WriteLine%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: 此屬性會決定哪些值 （位元組） 定義的線結尾<xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.ReadLine%2A>和<xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.WriteLine%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: By default the end-of-line value is <xref:System.Environment.NewLine%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 根據預設行尾值是<xref:System.Environment.NewLine%2A>。

trans-unit.source: You would change this to a different value if the particular serial device you’re working with uses a different value for the same purpose.
trans-unit.target: 您會變更為不同的值如果您正在使用特定的序列裝置針對相同目的使用不同的值。

trans-unit.source: The property value is empty.
trans-unit.target: 屬性值是空的。

trans-unit.source: The property value is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 屬性值為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Opens a new serial port connection.
trans-unit.target: 開啟新的序列埠連線。

trans-unit.source: Only one open connection can exist per <xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort> object.
trans-unit.target: 每個只能存在一個開啟的連接<xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort>物件。

trans-unit.source: The best practice for any application is to wait for some amount of time after calling the <xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.Close%2A> method before attempting to call the <xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.Open%2A> method, as the port may not be closed instantly.
trans-unit.target: 任何應用程式的最佳作法是等待一段時間之後呼叫<xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.Close%2A>方法，然後再嘗試呼叫<xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.Open%2A>方法，做為連接埠可能不會關閉立即。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the use of the <xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort> class to allow two users to chat from two separate computers connected by a null modem cable.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用<xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort>允許透過 null 數據機纜線連接兩個不同的電腦從交談的兩個使用者類別。

trans-unit.source: In this example, the users are prompted for the port settings and a username before chatting.
trans-unit.target: 在此範例中，會提示使用者輸入的連接埠設定及使用者名稱才能交談。

trans-unit.source: This code example is part of a larger code example provided for the <xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort> class.
trans-unit.target: 這個程式碼範例是提供之較大程式碼範例的一部分<xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort>類別。

trans-unit.source: Access is denied to the port.
trans-unit.target: 拒絕對連接埠的存取。

trans-unit.source: \- or -
The current process, or another process on the system, already has the specified COM port open either by a <see cref="T:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort" /> instance or in unmanaged code.
trans-unit.target: 目前處理序中 (或系統上的另一個處理序)，指定的 COM 連接埠已經由 <see cref="T:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort" /> 執行個體或以 Unmanaged 程式碼開啟。

trans-unit.source: One or more of the properties for this instance are invalid.
trans-unit.target: 這個執行個體的一個或多個屬性無效。

trans-unit.source: For example, the <see cref="P:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.Parity" />, <see cref="P:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.DataBits" />, or <see cref="P:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.Handshake" /> properties are not valid values; the <see cref="P:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.BaudRate" /> is less than or equal to zero; the <see cref="P:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.ReadTimeout" /> or <see cref="P:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.WriteTimeout" /> property is less than zero and is not <see cref="F:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.InfiniteTimeout" />.
trans-unit.target: 例如，<see cref="P:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.Parity" />、<see cref="P:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.DataBits" /> 或 <see cref="P:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.Handshake" /> 屬性並非有效值，<see cref="P:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.BaudRate" /> 小於或等於零，<see cref="P:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.ReadTimeout" /> 或 <see cref="P:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.WriteTimeout" /> 屬性小於零且不為 <see cref="F:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.InfiniteTimeout" />。

trans-unit.source: The port name does not begin with "COM".
trans-unit.target: 連接埠名稱不以 "COM" 開頭。

trans-unit.source: \- or -
The file type of the port is not supported.
trans-unit.target: 不支援連接埠的檔案類型。

trans-unit.source: The port is in an invalid state.
trans-unit.target: 連接埠處於無效狀態。

trans-unit.source: \- or -
An attempt to set the state of the underlying port failed.
trans-unit.target: 嘗試設定基礎連接埠的狀態失敗。

trans-unit.source: For example, the parameters passed from this <see cref="T:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort" /> object were invalid.
trans-unit.target: 例如，從這個 <see cref="T:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort" /> 物件傳遞而來的參數無效。

trans-unit.source: The specified port on the current instance of the <see cref="T:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort" /> is already open.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort" /> 的目前執行個體上的指定連接埠已經開啟。

trans-unit.source: for calling unmanaged code.
trans-unit.target: 用於呼叫 unmanaged 程式碼。

trans-unit.source: Associated enumeration: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.UnmanagedCode" /> Security action: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.LinkDemand" />
trans-unit.target: 列舉型別相關聯：<see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.UnmanagedCode" />安全性動作： <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.LinkDemand" />

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the parity-checking protocol.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定同位檢查通訊協定。

trans-unit.source: One of the enumeration values that represents the parity-checking protocol.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個列舉值，表示同位檢查通訊協定。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see cref="F:System.IO.Ports.Parity.None" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see cref="F:System.IO.Ports.Parity.None" />。

trans-unit.source: Parity is an error-checking procedure in which the number of 1s must always be the same—either even or odd—for each group of bits that is transmitted without error.
trans-unit.target: 同位檢查是檢查錯誤的程序，在其中 1 的數量都必須相同，奇數或偶數 — 每個群組的位元的傳輸不會發生錯誤。

trans-unit.source: In modem-to-modem communications, parity is often one of the parameters that must be agreed upon by sending parties and receiving parties before transmission can take place.
trans-unit.target: 在數據機來數據機通訊中，同位檢查通常是其中一個必須同意透過合作對象的傳送和接收合作對象才傳輸會將參數。

trans-unit.source: If a parity error occurs on the trailing byte of a stream, an extra byte will be added to the input buffer with a value of 126.
trans-unit.target: 如果同位檢查錯誤發生的資料流結尾的位元組，額外的位元組會加入輸入緩衝區，其值為 126。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the use of the <xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort> class to allow two users to chat from two separate computers connected by a null modem cable.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用<xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort>允許透過 null 數據機纜線連接兩個不同的電腦從交談的兩個使用者類別。

trans-unit.source: In this example, the users are prompted for the port settings and a username before chatting.
trans-unit.target: 在此範例中，會提示使用者輸入的連接埠設定及使用者名稱才能交談。

trans-unit.source: This code example is part of a larger code example provided for the <xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort> class.
trans-unit.target: 這個程式碼範例是提供之較大程式碼範例的一部分<xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort>類別。

trans-unit.source: The port is in an invalid state.
trans-unit.target: 連接埠處於無效狀態。

trans-unit.source: \- or -
An attempt to set the state of the underlying port failed.
trans-unit.target: 嘗試設定基礎連接埠的狀態失敗。

trans-unit.source: For example, the parameters passed from this <see cref="T:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort" /> object were invalid.
trans-unit.target: 例如，從這個 <see cref="T:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort" /> 物件傳遞而來的參數無效。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.Parity" /> value passed is not a valid value in the <see cref="T:System.IO.Ports.Parity" /> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: 傳遞的 <see cref="P:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.Parity" /> 值不是 <see cref="T:System.IO.Ports.Parity" /> 列舉型別中的有效值。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the byte that replaces invalid bytes in a data stream when a parity error occurs.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定位元組，該位元組會在發生同位檢查錯誤時，取代資料流中的無效位元組。

trans-unit.source: A byte that replaces invalid bytes.
trans-unit.target: 取代無效位元組的位元組。

trans-unit.source: If the value is set to the null character, parity replacement is disabled.
trans-unit.target: 如果值設定為 null 字元，取代同位檢查已停用。

trans-unit.source: The port is in an invalid state.
trans-unit.target: 連接埠處於無效狀態。

trans-unit.source: \- or -
An attempt to set the state of the underlying port failed.
trans-unit.target: 嘗試設定基礎連接埠的狀態失敗。

trans-unit.source: For example, the parameters passed from this <see cref="T:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort" /> object were invalid.
trans-unit.target: 例如，從這個 <see cref="T:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort" /> 物件傳遞而來的參數無效。

trans-unit.source: Indicates that a non-data signal event has occurred on the port represented by the <see cref="T:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 表示在 <see cref="T:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort" /> 物件所代表的連接埠上已發生非資料訊號事件。

trans-unit.source: Serial pin changed events can be caused by any of the items in the <xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPinChange> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: 序列的 pin 變更事件可能因任何項目中<xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPinChange>列舉型別。

trans-unit.source: Because the operating system determines whether to raise this event or not, not all parity errors may be reported.
trans-unit.target: 由於作業系統會決定是否要引發這個事件，並非所有的同位檢查錯誤可能會報告。

trans-unit.source: As part of the event, the new value of the pin is set.
trans-unit.target: 事件的一部分，會設定 pin 的新值。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.PinChanged> event is raised when a <xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort> object enters the <xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.BreakState%2A>, but not when the port exits the <xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.BreakState%2A>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.PinChanged>就會引發事件時<xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort>物件進入<xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.BreakState%2A>，但是不在連接埠會在結束<xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.BreakState%2A>。

trans-unit.source: This behavior does not apply to other values in the <xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPinChange> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: 不適用這項行為中的其他值<xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPinChange>列舉型別。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.PinChanged>, <xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.DataReceived>, and <xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.ErrorReceived> events may be called out of order, and there may be a slight delay between when the underlying stream reports the error and when the event handler is executed.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.PinChanged><xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.DataReceived>，和<xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.ErrorReceived>事件可能呼叫順序，並可能稍有延遲，基礎資料流時報告錯誤和事件處理常式執行時之間。

trans-unit.source: Only one event handler can execute at a time.
trans-unit.target: 只有一個事件處理常式可以執行一次。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.PinChanged> event is raised on a secondary thread.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.PinChanged>次要執行緒上引發事件。

trans-unit.source: Because this event is raised on a secondary thread, and not the main thread, attempting to modify some elements in the main thread, such as UI elements, could raise a threading exception.
trans-unit.target: 因為次要執行緒，而不主執行緒，嘗試修改某些項目，例如 UI 項目，在主執行緒中的引發這個事件可能會引發執行緒的例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: If it is necessary to modify elements in the main <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control>, post change requests back using <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Invoke%2A>, which will do the work on the proper thread.
trans-unit.target: 如果有必要修改在主要的項目<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control>、 張貼變更要求使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Invoke%2A>，這會執行適當的執行緒上的工作。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the port for communications, including but not limited to all available COM ports.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定通訊連接埠，包括但不限於所有可用的 COM 連接埠。

trans-unit.source: The communications port.
trans-unit.target: 通訊連接埠。

trans-unit.source: The default is COM1.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 COM1。

trans-unit.source: A list of valid port names can be obtained using the <xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.GetPortNames%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 有效的連接埠名稱的清單可透過使用<xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.GetPortNames%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the use of the <xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort> class to allow two users to chat from two separate computers connected by a null modem cable.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用<xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort>允許透過 null 數據機纜線連接兩個不同的電腦從交談的兩個使用者類別。

trans-unit.source: In this example, the users are prompted for the port settings and a username before chatting.
trans-unit.target: 在此範例中，會提示使用者輸入的連接埠設定及使用者名稱才能交談。

trans-unit.source: This code example is part of a larger code example provided for the <xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort> class.
trans-unit.target: 這個程式碼範例是提供之較大程式碼範例的一部分<xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort>類別。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.PortName" /> property was set to a value with a length of zero.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.PortName" /> 屬性設為長度為零的值。

trans-unit.source: -or-
The <see cref="P:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.PortName" /> property was set to a value that starts with "\\\\".
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.PortName" /> 屬性設為以 "\\\\" 開頭的值。

trans-unit.source: -or-
The port name was not valid.
trans-unit.target: 連接埠名稱無效。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.PortName" /> property was set to <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.PortName" /> 屬性被設定為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The specified port is open.
trans-unit.target: 指定的連接埠已開啟。

trans-unit.source: Reads from the <see cref="T:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort" /> input buffer.
trans-unit.target: 從 <see cref="T:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort" /> 輸入緩衝區讀取。

trans-unit.source: The byte array to write the input to.
trans-unit.target: 要寫入輸入的位元組陣列。

trans-unit.source: The offset in <c>buffer</c> at which to write the bytes.
trans-unit.target: 「緩衝區」<c></c>中要寫入位元組的位移。

trans-unit.source: The maximum number of bytes to read.
trans-unit.target: 要讀取的最大位元組數。

trans-unit.source: Fewer bytes are read if <c>count</c> is greater than the number of bytes in the input buffer.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <c>count</c> 大於輸入緩衝區的位元組數目，則會讀取較少的位元組。

trans-unit.source: Reads a number of bytes from the <see cref="T:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort" /> input buffer and writes those bytes into a byte array at the specified offset.
trans-unit.target: 從 <see cref="T:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort" /> 輸入緩衝區讀取大量位元組，並將它們寫入指定位移上的位元組陣列。

trans-unit.source: The number of bytes read.
trans-unit.target: 讀取的位元組數。

trans-unit.source: If it is necessary to switch between reading text and reading binary data from the stream, select a protocol that carefully defines the boundary between text and binary data, such as manually reading bytes and decoding the data.
trans-unit.target: 如果有必要讀取文字和從資料流讀取二進位資料之間切換，選取的通訊協定，請仔細定義文字和二進位資料，例如手動讀取位元組，並解碼資料之間的界限。

trans-unit.source: Because the <xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort> class buffers data, and the stream contained in the <xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.BaseStream%2A> property does not, the two might conflict about how many bytes are available to read.
trans-unit.target: 因為<xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort>類別緩衝處理資料，並中包含的資料流<xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.BaseStream%2A>屬性未、 兩個可能發生衝突詳細可讀取的位元組數目。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.BytesToRead%2A> property can indicate that there are bytes to read, but these bytes might not be accessible to the stream contained in the <xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.BaseStream%2A> property because they have been buffered to the <xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort> class.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.BytesToRead%2A>屬性可以讀取的位元組，但可能無法存取資料流中包含這些位元組會指出<xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.BaseStream%2A>屬性因為緩衝至<xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort>類別。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.Read%2A> method does not block other operations when the number of bytes read equals `count` but there are still unread bytes available on the serial port.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.Read%2A>方法不會封鎖其他作業時讀取 equals 的位元組數`count`但上都有未讀取的位元組序列的連接埠。

trans-unit.source: The buffer passed is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 傳遞的 buffer 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The specified port is not open.
trans-unit.target: 指定的連接埠未開啟。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="offset" /> or <paramref name="count" /> parameters are outside a valid region of the <paramref name="buffer" /> being passed.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="offset" /> 或 <paramref name="count" /> 參數超出所傳遞之 <paramref name="buffer" /> 的有效區域以外。

trans-unit.source: Either <paramref name="offset" /> or <paramref name="count" /> is less than zero.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="offset" /> 或 <paramref name="count" /> 小於零。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="offset" /> plus <paramref name="count" /> is greater than the length of the <paramref name="buffer" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="offset" /> 加上 <paramref name="count" /> 大於 <paramref name="buffer" /> 的長度。

trans-unit.source: No bytes were available to read.
trans-unit.target: 沒有可讀取的位元組。

trans-unit.source: The character array to write the input to.
trans-unit.target: 要寫入輸入的字元陣列。

trans-unit.source: The offset in <c>buffer</c> at which to write the characters.
trans-unit.target: 「緩衝區」<c></c>中要寫入字元的位移。

trans-unit.source: The maximum number of characters to read.
trans-unit.target: 要讀取的字元數上限。

trans-unit.source: Fewer characters are read if <c>count</c> is greater than the number of characters in the input buffer.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <c>count</c> 大於輸入緩衝區的字元數目，則會讀取較少的字元。

trans-unit.source: Reads a number of characters from the <see cref="T:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort" /> input buffer and writes them into an array of characters at a given offset.
trans-unit.target: 從 <see cref="T:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort" /> 輸入緩衝區讀取大量字元，並將它們寫入指定位移上的字元陣列。

trans-unit.source: The number of characters read.
trans-unit.target: 已讀取的字元數。

trans-unit.source: Use this method for reading characters from the serial port.
trans-unit.target: 使用這個方法，從序列埠讀取的字元。

trans-unit.source: If it is necessary to switch between reading text and reading binary data from the stream, select a protocol that carefully defines the boundary between text and binary data, such as manually reading bytes and decoding the data.
trans-unit.target: 如果有必要讀取文字和從資料流讀取二進位資料之間切換，選取的通訊協定，請仔細定義文字和二進位資料，例如手動讀取位元組，並解碼資料之間的界限。

trans-unit.source: Because the <xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort> class buffers data, and the stream contained in the <xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.BaseStream%2A> property does not, the two might conflict about how many characters are available to read.
trans-unit.target: 因為<xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort>類別緩衝處理資料，並中包含的資料流<xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.BaseStream%2A>屬性未、 兩個可能發生衝突詳細可讀取的字元數。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.BytesToRead%2A> property can indicate that there are characters to read, but these characters might not be accessible to the stream contained in the <xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.BaseStream%2A> property because they have been buffered to the <xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort> class.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.BytesToRead%2A>屬性可以有字元可供讀取，但是可能無法存取資料流中包含這些字元會指出<xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.BaseStream%2A>屬性因為緩衝至<xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort>類別。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.Read%2A> method does not block other operations when the number of bytes read equals `count` but there are still unread bytes available on the serial port.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.Read%2A>方法不會封鎖其他作業時讀取 equals 的位元組數`count`但上都有未讀取的位元組序列的連接埠。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="offset" /> plus <paramref name="count" /> is greater than the length of the buffer.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="offset" /> 加上 <paramref name="count" /> 大於緩衝區的長度。

trans-unit.source: \- or -
<paramref name="count" /> is 1 and there is a surrogate character in the buffer.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="count" /> 為 1 且緩衝區中有 Surrogate 字元。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="buffer" /> passed is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 傳遞的 <paramref name="buffer" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="offset" /> or <paramref name="count" /> parameters are outside a valid region of the <paramref name="buffer" /> being passed.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="offset" /> 或 <paramref name="count" /> 參數超出所傳遞之 <paramref name="buffer" /> 的有效區域以外。

trans-unit.source: Either <paramref name="offset" /> or <paramref name="count" /> is less than zero.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="offset" /> 或 <paramref name="count" /> 小於零。

trans-unit.source: The specified port is not open.
trans-unit.target: 指定的連接埠未開啟。

trans-unit.source: No characters were available to read.
trans-unit.target: 沒有可讀取的字元。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the size of the <see cref="T:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort" /> input buffer.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定 <see cref="T:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort" /> 輸入緩衝區的大小。

trans-unit.source: The buffer size, in bytes.
trans-unit.target: 緩衝區大小，以位元組為單位。

trans-unit.source: The default value is 4096; the maximum value is that of a positive int, or 2147483647.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 4096，最大值是正整數最大值或 2147483647。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.ReadBufferSize%2A> property ignores any value smaller than 4096.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.ReadBufferSize%2A>屬性會略過的任何值小於 4096。

trans-unit.source: Because the <xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.ReadBufferSize%2A> property represents only the Windows-created buffer, it can return a smaller value than the <xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.BytesToRead%2A> property, which represents both the <xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort> buffer and the Windows-created buffer.
trans-unit.target: 因為<xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.ReadBufferSize%2A>屬性表示只在 Windows 建立的緩衝區，它可以傳回較小的值比<xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.BytesToRead%2A>屬性，用來代表兩者<xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort>緩衝區和 Windows 建立的緩衝區。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.ReadBufferSize" /> value set is less than or equal to zero.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.ReadBufferSize" /> 值設定小於或等於零。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.ReadBufferSize" /> property was set while the stream was open.
trans-unit.target: 資料流開啟時設定 <see cref="P:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.ReadBufferSize" /> 屬性。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.ReadBufferSize" /> property was set to an odd integer value.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.ReadBufferSize" /> 屬性設為奇數整數值。

trans-unit.source: Synchronously reads one byte from the <see cref="T:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort" /> input buffer.
trans-unit.target: 從 <see cref="T:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort" /> 輸入緩衝區同步讀取一個位元組。

trans-unit.source: The byte, cast to an <see cref="T:System.Int32" />, or -1 if the end of the stream has been read.
trans-unit.target: 轉換為 <see cref="T:System.Int32" /> 的位元組，如果已讀取資料流的末端，則為 -1。

trans-unit.source: This method reads one byte.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會讀取一個位元組。

trans-unit.source: Use caution when using <xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.ReadByte%2A> and <xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.ReadChar%2A> together.
trans-unit.target: 請謹慎使用<xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.ReadByte%2A>和<xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.ReadChar%2A>在一起。

trans-unit.source: Switching between reading bytes and reading characters can cause extra data to be read and/or other unintended behavior.
trans-unit.target: 讀取位元組，並讀取字元之間切換，可能會造成額外的資料讀取及/或其他非預期的行為。

trans-unit.source: If it is necessary to switch between reading text and reading binary data from the stream, select a protocol that carefully defines the boundary between text and binary data, such as manually reading bytes and decoding the data.
trans-unit.target: 如果有必要讀取文字和從資料流讀取二進位資料之間切換，選取的通訊協定，請仔細定義文字和二進位資料，例如手動讀取位元組，並解碼資料之間的界限。

trans-unit.source: Because the <xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort> class buffers data, and the stream contained in the <xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.BaseStream%2A> property does not, the two might conflict about how many bytes are available to read.
trans-unit.target: 因為<xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort>類別緩衝處理資料，並中包含的資料流<xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.BaseStream%2A>屬性未、 兩個可能發生衝突詳細可讀取的位元組數目。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.BytesToRead%2A> property can indicate that there are bytes to read, but these bytes might not be accessible to the stream contained in the <xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.BaseStream%2A> property because they have been buffered to the <xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort> class.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.BytesToRead%2A>屬性可以讀取的位元組，但可能無法存取資料流中包含這些位元組會指出<xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.BaseStream%2A>屬性因為緩衝至<xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort>類別。

trans-unit.source: The specified port is not open.
trans-unit.target: 指定的連接埠未開啟。

trans-unit.source: The operation did not complete before the time-out period ended.
trans-unit.target: 作業沒有在逾時期間結束之前完成。

trans-unit.source: \- or -
No byte was read.
trans-unit.target: 沒有讀取任何位元組。

trans-unit.source: Synchronously reads one character from the <see cref="T:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort" /> input buffer.
trans-unit.target: 從 <see cref="T:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort" /> 輸入緩衝區同步讀取一個字元。

trans-unit.source: The character that was read.
trans-unit.target: 讀取的字元。

trans-unit.source: This method reads one complete character based on the encoding.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會讀取一個完整的字元為基礎的編碼方式。

trans-unit.source: Use caution when using <xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.ReadByte%2A> and <xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.ReadChar%2A> together.
trans-unit.target: 請謹慎使用<xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.ReadByte%2A>和<xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.ReadChar%2A>在一起。

trans-unit.source: Switching between reading bytes and reading characters can cause extra data to be read and/or other unintended behavior.
trans-unit.target: 讀取位元組，並讀取字元之間切換，可能會造成額外的資料讀取及/或其他非預期的行為。

trans-unit.source: If it is necessary to switch between reading text and reading binary data from the stream, select a protocol that carefully defines the boundary between text and binary data, such as manually reading bytes and decoding the data.
trans-unit.target: 如果有必要讀取文字和從資料流讀取二進位資料之間切換，選取的通訊協定，請仔細定義文字和二進位資料，例如手動讀取位元組，並解碼資料之間的界限。

trans-unit.source: Because the <xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort> class buffers data, and the stream contained in the <xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.BaseStream%2A> property does not, the two might conflict about how many bytes are available to read.
trans-unit.target: 因為<xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort>類別緩衝處理資料，並中包含的資料流<xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.BaseStream%2A>屬性未、 兩個可能發生衝突詳細可讀取的位元組數目。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.BytesToRead%2A> property can indicate that there are bytes to read, but these bytes might not be accessible to the stream contained in the <xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.BaseStream%2A> property because they have been buffered to the <xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort> class.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.BytesToRead%2A>屬性可以讀取的位元組，但可能無法存取資料流中包含這些位元組會指出<xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.BaseStream%2A>屬性因為緩衝至<xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort>類別。

trans-unit.source: The specified port is not open.
trans-unit.target: 指定的連接埠未開啟。

trans-unit.source: The operation did not complete before the time-out period ended.
trans-unit.target: 作業沒有在逾時期間結束之前完成。

trans-unit.source: \- or -
No character was available in the allotted time-out period.
trans-unit.target: 指定逾時期間沒有可用的字元。

trans-unit.source: Reads all immediately available bytes, based on the encoding, in both the stream and the input buffer of the <see cref="T:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 根據編碼方式，讀取 <see cref="T:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort" /> 物件的資料流和輸入緩衝區中所有立即可用的位元組。

trans-unit.source: The contents of the stream and the input buffer of the <see cref="T:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort" /> object.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort" /> 物件的資料流和輸入緩衝區的內容。

trans-unit.source: This method returns the contents of the stream and internal buffer of the <xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort> object as a string.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會傳回資料流和內部緩衝區的內容<xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort>物件做為字串。

trans-unit.source: This method does not use a time-out. Note that this method can leave trailing lead bytes in the internal buffer, which makes the <xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.BytesToRead%2A> value greater than zero.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法不使用逾時。請注意，這個方法可以保留尾端前導位元組會在內部緩衝區<xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.BytesToRead%2A>值小於或等於零。

trans-unit.source: If it is necessary to switch between reading text and reading binary data from the stream, select a protocol that carefully defines the boundary between text and binary data, such as manually reading bytes and decoding the data.
trans-unit.target: 如果有必要讀取文字和從資料流讀取二進位資料之間切換，選取的通訊協定，請仔細定義文字和二進位資料，例如手動讀取位元組，並解碼資料之間的界限。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort> class buffers data, but the stream object contained in the <xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.BaseStream%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property does not.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort>類別緩衝處理資料，但資料流物件中包含<xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.BaseStream%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>屬性則否。

trans-unit.source: Therefore, the <xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort> object and the stream object might differ on the number of bytes that are available to read.
trans-unit.target: 因此，<xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort>物件和資料流物件可能會與不同的可讀取的位元組數目。

trans-unit.source: When bytes are buffered to the <xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort> object, the <xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.BytesToRead%2A> property includes these bytes in its value; however, these bytes might not be accessible to the stream contained in the <xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.BaseStream%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 當緩衝的位元組至<xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort>物件，<xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.BytesToRead%2A>屬性其值也包含這些位元組; 不過，這些位元組可能無法存取資料流中包含<xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.BaseStream%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: The specified port is not open.
trans-unit.target: 指定的連接埠未開啟。

trans-unit.source: Reads up to the <see cref="P:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.NewLine" /> value in the input buffer.
trans-unit.target: 讀取輸入緩衝區 <see cref="P:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.NewLine" /> 值之前的內容。

trans-unit.source: The contents of the input buffer up to the first occurrence of a <see cref="P:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.NewLine" /> value.
trans-unit.target: 輸入緩衝區第一次出現 <see cref="P:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.NewLine" /> 值之前的內容。

trans-unit.source: Note that while this method does not return the <xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.NewLine%2A> value, the <xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.NewLine%2A> value is removed from the input buffer.
trans-unit.target: 請注意，雖然這個方法不會傳回<xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.NewLine%2A>值<xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.NewLine%2A>從輸入緩衝區中移除值。

trans-unit.source: By default, the <xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.ReadLine%2A> method will block until a line is received.
trans-unit.target: 根據預設，<xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.ReadLine%2A>方法將會封鎖，直到收到一條線為止。

trans-unit.source: If this behavior is undesirable, set the <xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.ReadTimeout%2A> property to any non-zero value to force the <xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.ReadLine%2A> method to throw a <xref:System.TimeoutException> if a line is not available on the port.
trans-unit.target: 如果不想要這項行為，請設定<xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.ReadTimeout%2A>屬性為任何非零值，以強制<xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.ReadLine%2A>方法會擲回<xref:System.TimeoutException>如果連接埠上無法使用一條線。

trans-unit.source: If it is necessary to switch between reading text and reading binary data from the stream, select a protocol that carefully defines the boundary between text and binary data, such as manually reading bytes and decoding the data.
trans-unit.target: 如果有必要讀取文字和從資料流讀取二進位資料之間切換，選取的通訊協定，請仔細定義文字和二進位資料，例如手動讀取位元組，並解碼資料之間的界限。

trans-unit.source: Because the <xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort> class buffers data, and the stream contained in the <xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.BaseStream%2A> property does not, the two might conflict about how many bytes are available to read.
trans-unit.target: 因為<xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort>類別緩衝處理資料，並中包含的資料流<xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.BaseStream%2A>屬性未、 兩個可能發生衝突詳細可讀取的位元組數目。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.BytesToRead%2A> property can indicate that there are bytes to read, but these bytes might not be accessible to the stream contained in the <xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.BaseStream%2A> property because they have been buffered to the <xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort> class.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.BytesToRead%2A>屬性可以讀取的位元組，但可能無法存取資料流中包含這些位元組會指出<xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.BaseStream%2A>屬性因為緩衝至<xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort>類別。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the use of the <xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort> class to allow two users to chat from two separate computers connected by a null modem cable.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用<xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort>允許透過 null 數據機纜線連接兩個不同的電腦從交談的兩個使用者類別。

trans-unit.source: This code example is part of a larger code example provided for the <xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort> class.
trans-unit.target: 這個程式碼範例是提供之較大程式碼範例的一部分<xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort>類別。

trans-unit.source: The specified port is not open.
trans-unit.target: 指定的連接埠未開啟。

trans-unit.source: The operation did not complete before the time-out period ended.
trans-unit.target: 作業沒有在逾時期間結束之前完成。

trans-unit.source: \- or -
No bytes were read.
trans-unit.target: 沒有讀取任何位元組。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the number of milliseconds before a time-out occurs when a read operation does not finish.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定讀取作業未完成時，發生逾時之前的毫秒數。

trans-unit.source: The number of milliseconds before a time-out occurs when a read operation does not finish.
trans-unit.target: 讀取作業未完成時，發生逾時之前的毫秒數。

trans-unit.source: The read time-out value was originally set at 500 milliseconds in the Win32 Communications API.
trans-unit.target: 讀取的逾時值原本已設為 500 毫秒 Win32 通訊應用程式開發介面中。

trans-unit.source: This property allows you to set this value.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性可讓您設定此值。

trans-unit.source: The time-out can be set to any value greater than zero, or set to <xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.InfiniteTimeout>, in which case no time-out occurs.
trans-unit.target: 逾時可以設定為任何值小於或等於零，或設為<xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.InfiniteTimeout>，在此情況下不會逾時，就會發生。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.InfiniteTimeout> is the default.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.InfiniteTimeout> 是預設值。

trans-unit.source: Users of the unmanaged `COMMTIMEOUTS` structure might expect to set the time-out value to zero to suppress time-outs.
trans-unit.target: 未受管理的使用者`COMMTIMEOUTS`結構可能預期的逾時值設定為零可隱藏逾時。

trans-unit.source: To suppress time-outs with the <xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.ReadTimeout%2A> property, however, you must specify <xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.InfiniteTimeout>.
trans-unit.target: 若要隱藏的逾時<xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.ReadTimeout%2A>屬性，不過，您必須指定<xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.InfiniteTimeout>。

trans-unit.source: This property does not affect the <xref:System.IO.Stream.BeginRead%2A> method of the stream returned by the <xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.BaseStream%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性不會影響<xref:System.IO.Stream.BeginRead%2A>方法所傳回之資料流<xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.BaseStream%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the use of the <xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort> class to allow two users to chat from two separate computers connected by a null modem cable.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用<xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort>允許透過 null 數據機纜線連接兩個不同的電腦從交談的兩個使用者類別。

trans-unit.source: In this example, the users are prompted for the port settings and a username before chatting.
trans-unit.target: 在此範例中，會提示使用者輸入的連接埠設定及使用者名稱才能交談。

trans-unit.target: 指出讀取作業停止位置的值。

trans-unit.target: 讀取在輸入緩衝區中指定 <paramref name="value" /> 之前的字串。

trans-unit.source: The contents of the input buffer up to the specified <paramref name="value" />.
trans-unit.target: 指定 <paramref name="value" /> 之前的輸入緩衝區內容。

trans-unit.source: This method reads a string up to the specified `value`.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會讀取之前指定的字串`value`。

trans-unit.source: While the returned string does not include the `value`, the `value` is removed from the input buffer.
trans-unit.target: 雖然傳回的字串沒有包括`value`、`value`會從輸入緩衝區中移除。

trans-unit.source: If it is necessary to switch between reading text and reading binary data from the stream, select a protocol that carefully defines the boundary between text and binary data, such as manually reading bytes and decoding the data.
trans-unit.target: 如果有必要讀取文字和從資料流讀取二進位資料之間切換，選取的通訊協定，請仔細定義文字和二進位資料，例如手動讀取位元組，並解碼資料之間的界限。

trans-unit.target: 因為<xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort>類別緩衝處理資料，並中包含的資料流<xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.BaseStream%2A>屬性未、 兩個可能發生衝突詳細可讀取的位元組數目。

trans-unit.target: <paramref name="value" /> 參數的長度為 0。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="value" /> parameter is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="value" /> 參數為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.target: 指定的連接埠未開啟。

trans-unit.target: 作業沒有在逾時期間結束之前完成。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the number of bytes in the internal input buffer before a <see cref="E:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.DataReceived" /> event occurs.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定 <see cref="E:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.DataReceived" /> 事件發生之前，內部輸入緩衝區中的位元組數。

trans-unit.source: The number of bytes in the internal input buffer before a <see cref="E:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.DataReceived" /> event is fired.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="E:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.DataReceived" /> 事件引發之前，內部輸入緩衝區中的位元組數。

trans-unit.source: The default is 1.
trans-unit.target: 預設為 1。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.DataReceived> event is also raised if an <xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialData.Eof> character is received, regardless of the number of bytes in the internal input buffer and the value of the <xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.ReceivedBytesThreshold%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.DataReceived>事件也會引發如果<xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialData.Eof>收到字元時，內部輸入緩衝區中的位元組數目，而不論<xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.ReceivedBytesThreshold%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.ReceivedBytesThreshold" /> value is less than or equal to zero.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.ReceivedBytesThreshold" /> 值小於或等於零。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the Request to Send (RTS) signal is enabled during serial communication.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出在序列通訊期間是否啟用 Request to Send (RTS) 信號。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to enable Request to Transmit (RTS); otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果啟用 Request to Transmit (RTS) 則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The Request to Transmit (RTS) signal is typically used in Request to Send/Clear to Send (RTS/CTS) hardware handshaking.
trans-unit.target: Request to Transmit (RTS) 信號通常用於傳送/清除的要求來傳送 (RTS/CTS) 硬體交握。

trans-unit.source: The value of the <see cref="P:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.RtsEnable" /> property was set or retrieved while the <see cref="P:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.Handshake" /> property is set to the <see cref="F:System.IO.Ports.Handshake.RequestToSend" /> value or the <see cref="F:System.IO.Ports.Handshake.RequestToSendXOnXOff" /> value.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.RtsEnable" /> 屬性設為 <see cref="P:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.Handshake" /> 值或 <see cref="F:System.IO.Ports.Handshake.RequestToSend" /> 值時，設定或擷取 <see cref="F:System.IO.Ports.Handshake.RequestToSendXOnXOff" /> 屬性的值。

trans-unit.source: The port is in an invalid state.
trans-unit.target: 連接埠處於無效狀態。

trans-unit.source: \- or -
An attempt to set the state of the underlying port failed.
trans-unit.target: 嘗試設定基礎連接埠的狀態失敗。

trans-unit.source: For example, the parameters passed from this <see cref="T:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort" /> object were invalid.
trans-unit.target: 例如，從這個 <see cref="T:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort" /> 物件傳遞而來的參數無效。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the standard number of stopbits per byte.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定每位元組之停止位元的標準數目。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.IO.Ports.StopBits" /> values.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個 <see cref="T:System.IO.Ports.StopBits" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: The default value for <xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.StopBits%2A> is <xref:System.IO.Ports.StopBits.One>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.StopBits%2A> 的預設值為 <xref:System.IO.Ports.StopBits.One>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IO.Ports.StopBits.None?displayProperty=nameWithType> value is not supported.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IO.Ports.StopBits.None?displayProperty=nameWithType>不支援值。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to set the <xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.StopBits%2A> property to `One`.

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates the use of the <xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort> class to allow two users to chat from two separate computers connected by a null modem cable.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何使用<xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort>允許透過 null 數據機纜線連接兩個不同的電腦從交談的兩個使用者類別。

trans-unit.source: In this example, the users are prompted for the port settings and a username before chatting.
trans-unit.target: 在此範例中，會提示使用者輸入的連接埠設定及使用者名稱才能交談。

trans-unit.source: This code example is part of a larger example provided for the <xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort> class.

An attempt to set the state of the underlying port failed.

trans-unit.source: Writes data to the serial port output buffer.
trans-unit.target: 將資料寫入序列埠輸出緩衝區。

trans-unit.source: Writes the specified string to the serial port.
trans-unit.target: 將指定的字串寫入序列埠。

trans-unit.source: Use this method when you want to write a string as output to a serial port.
trans-unit.target: 當您想要做為輸出的字串寫入序列埠時，請使用這個方法。

trans-unit.source: If there are too many bytes in the output buffer and <xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.Handshake%2A> is set to <xref:System.IO.Ports.Handshake.XOnXOff> then the <xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort> object may raise a <xref:System.ServiceProcess.TimeoutException> while it waits for the device to be ready to accept more data.
trans-unit.target: 在輸出緩衝區中是否有太多位元組和<xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.Handshake%2A>設<xref:System.IO.Ports.Handshake.XOnXOff>則<xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort>物件可能會引發<xref:System.ServiceProcess.TimeoutException>同時等候裝置準備好接受更多資料。

trans-unit.source: By default, <xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort> uses <xref:System.Text.ASCIIEncoding> to encode the characters.
trans-unit.target: 根據預設，<xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort>使用<xref:System.Text.ASCIIEncoding>來編碼的字元。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Text.ASCIIEncoding> encodes all characters greater than 127 as (char)63 or '?'.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Text.ASCIIEncoding> 將所有大於 127 的字元編碼成 (char) 63 或 '？ '。

trans-unit.source: To support additional characters in that range, set <xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.Encoding%2A> to <xref:System.Text.UTF8Encoding>, <xref:System.Text.UTF32Encoding>, or <xref:System.Text.UnicodeEncoding>.
trans-unit.target: 若要支援額外的字元在該範圍內，<xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.Encoding%2A>至<xref:System.Text.UTF8Encoding>， <xref:System.Text.UTF32Encoding>，或<xref:System.Text.UnicodeEncoding>。

trans-unit.source: The specified port is not open.
trans-unit.target: 指定的連接埠未開啟。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="text" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="text" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The operation did not complete before the time-out period ended.
trans-unit.target: 作業沒有在逾時期間結束之前完成。

trans-unit.source: The byte array that contains the data to write to the port.
trans-unit.target: 包含要寫入連接埠之資料的位元組陣列。

trans-unit.target: 「緩衝區」<c></c>參數中以零為起始的位元組位移，將會從該處開始將位元組複製到連接埠。

trans-unit.source: The number of bytes to write.
trans-unit.target: 要寫入的位元組數。

trans-unit.source: Writes a specified number of bytes to the serial port using data from a buffer.
trans-unit.target: 使用緩衝區中的資料，將指定的位元組數目寫入序列埠。

trans-unit.source: Use this method when you want to write to a byte buffer to create output to a serial port.
trans-unit.target: 當您想要寫入的位元組緩衝區，以建立輸出至序列埠，請使用這個方法。

trans-unit.source: If there are too many bytes in the output buffer and <xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.Handshake%2A> is set to <xref:System.IO.Ports.Handshake.XOnXOff> then the <xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort> object may raise a <xref:System.ServiceProcess.TimeoutException> while it waits for the device to be ready to accept more data.
trans-unit.target: 在輸出緩衝區中是否有太多位元組和<xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.Handshake%2A>設<xref:System.IO.Ports.Handshake.XOnXOff>則<xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort>物件可能會引發<xref:System.ServiceProcess.TimeoutException>同時等候裝置準備好接受更多資料。

trans-unit.source: By default, <xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort> uses <xref:System.Text.ASCIIEncoding> to encode the characters.
trans-unit.target: 根據預設，<xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort>使用<xref:System.Text.ASCIIEncoding>來編碼的字元。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Text.ASCIIEncoding> encodes all characters greater than 127 as (char)63 or '?'.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Text.ASCIIEncoding> 將所有大於 127 的字元編碼成 (char) 63 或 '？ '。

trans-unit.source: To support additional characters in that range, set <xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.Encoding%2A> to <xref:System.Text.UTF8Encoding>, <xref:System.Text.UTF32Encoding>, or <xref:System.Text.UnicodeEncoding>.
trans-unit.target: 若要支援額外的字元在該範圍內，<xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.Encoding%2A>至<xref:System.Text.UTF8Encoding>， <xref:System.Text.UTF32Encoding>，或<xref:System.Text.UnicodeEncoding>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the size of the serial port output buffer.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定序列埠輸出緩衝區的大小。

trans-unit.source: The size of the output buffer.
trans-unit.target: 輸出緩衝區的大小。

trans-unit.source: The default is 2048.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 2048。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.WriteBufferSize%2A> property ignores any value smaller than 2048.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.WriteBufferSize%2A>屬性會略過的任何值小於 2048年。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.WriteBufferSize" /> value is less than or equal to zero.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.WriteBufferSize" /> 值小於或等於零。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.WriteBufferSize" /> property was set while the stream was open.
trans-unit.target: 資料流開啟時設定 <see cref="P:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.WriteBufferSize" /> 屬性。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.WriteBufferSize" /> property was set to an odd integer value.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.WriteBufferSize" /> 屬性設為奇數整數值。

trans-unit.source: Writes the specified string and the <see cref="P:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.NewLine" /> value to the output buffer.

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the use of the <xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort> class to allow two users to chat from two separate computers connected by a null modem cable.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用<xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort>允許透過 null 數據機纜線連接兩個不同的電腦從交談的兩個使用者類別。

trans-unit.source: This code example is part of a larger code example provided for the <xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort> class.
trans-unit.target: 這個程式碼範例是提供之較大程式碼範例的一部分<xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort>類別。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="text" /> parameter is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="text" /> 參數為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The specified port is not open.
trans-unit.target: 指定的連接埠未開啟。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="M:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.WriteLine(System.String)" /> method could not write to the stream.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="M:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.WriteLine(System.String)" /> 方法無法寫入資料流。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the number of milliseconds before a time-out occurs when a write operation does not finish.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定寫入作業未完成時，發生逾時之前的毫秒數。

trans-unit.source: The number of milliseconds before a time-out occurs.
trans-unit.target: 發生逾時之前的毫秒數。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see cref="F:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.InfiniteTimeout" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see cref="F:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.InfiniteTimeout" />。

trans-unit.source: The write time-out value was originally set at 500 milliseconds in the Win32 Communications API.
trans-unit.target: 寫入逾時值原本已設為 500 毫秒 Win32 通訊應用程式開發介面中。

trans-unit.source: This property allows you to set this value.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性可讓您設定此值。

trans-unit.source: The time-out can be set to any value greater than zero, or set to <xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.InfiniteTimeout>, in which case no time-out occurs.
trans-unit.target: 逾時可以設定為任何值小於或等於零，或設為<xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.InfiniteTimeout>，在此情況下不會逾時，就會發生。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.InfiniteTimeout> is the default.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.InfiniteTimeout> 是預設值。

trans-unit.source: Users of the unmanaged `COMMTIMEOUTS` structure might expect to set the time-out value to zero to suppress time-outs.
trans-unit.target: 未受管理的使用者`COMMTIMEOUTS`結構可能預期的逾時值設定為零可隱藏逾時。

trans-unit.source: To suppress time-outs with the <xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.WriteTimeout%2A> property, however, you must specify <xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.InfiniteTimeout>.
trans-unit.target: 若要隱藏的逾時<xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.WriteTimeout%2A>屬性，不過，您必須指定<xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.InfiniteTimeout>。

trans-unit.source: This property does not affect the <xref:System.IO.Stream.BeginWrite%2A> method of the stream returned by the <xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.BaseStream%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性不會影響<xref:System.IO.Stream.BeginWrite%2A>方法所傳回之資料流<xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.BaseStream%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.target: 例如，從這個 <see cref="T:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort" /> 物件傳遞而來的參數無效。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.WriteTimeout" /> value is less than zero and not equal to <see cref="F:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.InfiniteTimeout" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.WriteTimeout" /> 值小於零而且不等於 <see cref="F:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.InfiniteTimeout" />。
